textFaqMinDepositObvion: What is the minimum deposit in Obvion?
textFaqForgotPasswordTron: I've lost my TronLink wallet password
textFaqWhyObiAlwaysGrow: Why does OBI price always go up?
textFaqMyContractHasLost: My contract has expired. What should I do?
textFaqWhyNeedToDoText: The Obvion project is based on an algorithm embedded in an open smart contract. This means that no one can crack the code: neither the Obvion project developers, nor the creators of Blockchain TRON, nor anyone else. Therefore, all partners can be sure that their funds cannot be stolen from the system, spent for personal purposes or used improperly. All links to the source codes of smart contracts can be found on the official website of the obvion.io project and in the chat-bot in the â€œSmart Contractsâ€ section. You can explore them directly and ascertain that the project is completely transparent.
textFaqConfidentDataText: Registration and login to the Obvion project is done via the TronLink wallet by checking the digital signature and authentication of the signed message. Verification of the digital signature on the TRON network is done automatically when you log in to the TronLink wallet, i. e. the user DOES NOT enter the confidential information of the wallet, such as password, private key or mnemonic phrase. The only information that is available to the Obvion system is the public address of the user's wallet in the following format: TJGSm68nwU8NA9BvsSnmGPzMp37gGrvwjz Smart contract identifies the user and makes payments by this address of the wallet.
textFaqInstallTronlinkText: Go to the official website of the obvion.io project and click on â€œTronLink Login/Registrationâ€, then a modal box will appear, after clicking on the hyperlink at the bottom of the box you will be automatically redirected to download the TronLink wallet. You can also go to the official website tronlink.org and choose the appropriate wallet version. We strongly recommend you to download the TronLink wallet only from the official website: tronlink.org
textFaqPayWalletTronText: To replenish the TronLink wallet you need to send TRX to your TronLink wallet address. TRX can be purchased on any cryptocurrency exchange or through a cryptocurrency exchange aggregator. 5. What is the minimum deposit in Obvion? âœ”ï¸ Minimum deposit amount for a smart contract: 1000 TRX âœ”ï¸ Minimum deposit amount for a smart contract to open levels under the affiliate program: 5000 TRX
textFaqMinDepositObvionText: âœ”ï¸ Minimum deposit amount for a smart contract: 1000 TRX âœ”ï¸ Minimum deposit amount for a smart contract to open levels under the affiliate program: 5000 TRX
textFaqHowPaySmartContractText: To replenish a smart contract you need to login to your personal account: go to the official website of the obvion.io project, click on â€œTronLink Login/Registrationâ€ and confirm login in your TronLink browser wallet. After confirmation in your TronLink wallet, you will be automatically redirected to your personal account. In your personal account click on the â€œReplenish the contractâ€ button and get acquainted with all the risk warnings and recommendations. After examining it, enter the amount of TRX and click on the â€œReplenish the contractâ€ button. Always keep some TRX on your TronLink wallet to pay for the transaction. On average, the fee for replenishing a smart contract is from 2 to 6 TRX. Once the transaction is confirmed, your deposit will be displayed in your Obvion project personal account.
textFaqBusinessManagementText: Obvion personal account is just a visual display of data downloaded from the Blockchain TRON. Therefore, even if for some reason the data from the website or personal account stop loading, Blockchain TRON will work in the same mode, and smart contracts will keep performing their functions of passive income and referral income accrual and OBI token distribution. Every action in a smart contract is only caused by a transaction, which means that you can always invoke any transaction without being linked to your personal account, i.e. directly from your TronLink wallet. Here is a list of transactions to help you invoke any smart contract action directly from your TronLink wallet: 1) Registration of a partner: You can register in the structure of the person who invited you, directly from your TronLink, wallet, without using the website and personal account. Guideline: 1. Open your TronLink wallet and click Â«SendÂ»; 2. In the Â«Receiving accountÂ» field, enter the address of the Obvion smart contract: TJGSm68nwU8NA9BvsSnmGPzMp37gGrvwjz; 3. In the Â«Transfer amountÂ» field, enter the recharge amount (be sure to save some TRX to pay the fee); 4. In the Â«Add transfer notesÂ» field, enter the address of the partner who invited you and click Â«SendÂ». Now you are registered in the Obvion project in the first line of the partner, whose address youâ€™ve entered in the Â«Add transfer notesÂ» field. All partner accruals are made automatically upon transaction confirmation. 2) Passive income accrual: To get the passive income reserved for you in the project, you need to send a zero transaction to the Obvion smart contract address. â€ƒ Guideline: 1. Open your TronLink wallet and click Â«SendÂ»; 2. In the Â«Receiving accountÂ» field, enter the address of the Obvion smart contract: TJGSm68nwU8NA9BvsSnmGPzMp37gGrvwjz 3. In the Â«Transfer amountÂ» field, enter â€œ0â€ and click send (be sure to save some TRX to pay the fee). After confirming the transaction, the passive income reserved for you will be credited to your wallet. 3) OBI tokens sale: OBI tokens are sold by transferring them to the OBI token smart contract address. Guideline: 1. Open your TronLink wallet, select OBI and click Â«SendÂ»; 2. In the Â«Receiving accountÂ» field, enter the address of the Obvion smart contract: TJGSm68nwU8NA9BvsSnmGPzMp37gGrvwjz 3. In the Â«Transfer amountÂ» field, enter the amount of OBI for sale and click send (be sure to save some TRX to pay the fee). After confirming the transaction, you will automatically receive a proportional amount of TRX in the pool, and the sent OBI tokens will be burned and will never participate in the capitalization assessment again.
textFaqSafeWalletStorageText: 1) Back up your mnemonic phrase or private key and store this data in a safe place. The most common way is to write down a phrase of 12-24 words on a piece of paper. Mnemonic phrase and private key is the only way to restore your funds in case of device failure or loss of your wallet. 2) If you lose a mnemonic phrase or private key, both TronLink and Obvion project will NOT be able to help you restore wallet access. 3) Never disclose the mnemonic phrase or private key of your wallet to third parties. 4) Do not use TronLink on public PC devices: at work, in computer clubs or university classrooms. Use only your personal device to access the wallet.
textFaqForgotPasswordTronText: The Obvion project does NOT own any confidential user data and does not provide support to restore wallet access. We always recommend that you write down mnemonic phrases, private keys and passwords on physical media: paper or notebooks and store them in a safe place.
textFaqWhyObiAlwaysGrowText: The smart contract algorithm is developed in such a way that any sale of OBI tokens by project participants will cause their burning, which will systematically reduce the number of tokens in circulation. At the same time, 5% of all investments go to the OBI token smart contract, which will ensure a gradual increase in its capitalization. After a while, the OBI pool will be replenished with new TRX and there will be no more tokens in circulation. Such an algorithm will cause the OBI token to grow organically in price.
textFaqContractActivityText: If your contract has expired, it means that your account is no longer active and you cannot receive passive or referral income. The account activity ends in 52 weekly payments under the Â«Contract 1Â», or any other contract that meets the following conditions: [Â«New contractÂ» >/= Â«Contract 1Â» and >/= 10,000 TRX]. In other words, in order to be able to close career levels and receive referral income from 3 to 12 lines, you need to have an active contract, which is more or equal to the Â«Contract 1Â» and more or equal to 10,000 TRX. If the user has expired Â«Contract 1Â», and all other Contracts do not meet the conditions: [Â«New contractÂ» >/= Â«Contract 1Â» and >/= 10,000 TRX], but at least one of the Contracts remains valid (is replenished in the amount of 1000 to 5000 TRX), the user continues to receive passive income, and referral income TRX and OBI is received only from the first two lines, because he has no possibility to close career levels. The User is entitled to receive referral income TRX and OBI from the first two lines as long as at least one unsatisfied Contract remains valid. In case a user replenishes the Contract again and its replenishment meets all the conditions, he will get the Â«LevelÂ» back and get the possibility to earn referral income from 3 to 12 lines.
textFaqMyContractHasLostText: If your contract is no longer active, it means that your 52-week period of receiving passive income has ended. If you want to extend the contract, you need to replenish your smart contract with an amount greater than your Â«Contract 1Â», but not less than 10,000 TRX. In this case your contract will be active for the next 52 weeks with the possibility of opening levels and receiving passive income.
